info.title: Amazon EC2 DHCP Options (Amazon VPC) API
info.description: The API for management DHCP Options (Amazon VPC)

get.summary: Associates a set of DHCP options (that you've previously created) with the specified VPC, orn      associates no DHCP options with the VPC.
get.description: Associates a set of DHCP options (that youve previously created) with the specified VPC, orn      associates no DHCP options with the VPC.

parameters.name: DhcpOptionsId
parameters.description: The ID of the DHCP options set, or default to associate         no DHCP options with the VPC.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

get.summary: Creates a set of DHCP options for your VPC.
get.description: Creates a set of DHCP options for your VPC.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

get.summary: Deletes the specified set of DHCP options.
get.description: Deletes the specified set of DHCP options.

parameters.name: DhcpOptionsId
parameters.description: The ID of the DHCP options set.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.

get.summary: Describes one or more of your DHCP options sets.
get.description: Describes one or more of your DHCP options sets.

parameters.name: DhcpOptionsId.N
parameters.description: The IDs of one or more DHCP options sets.

parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Checks whether you have the required permissions for the action, without actually making the request,        and provides an error response. If you have the required permissions, the error response is DryRunOperation.        Otherwise, it is UnauthorizedOperation.
